main event: Two disc-shaped objects were reported sighted in the sky over Lake Charles, Louisiana, on the night of 20 September 1953.
interesting points: The objects were described as basketball-shaped and bluish in color., The objects were sighted for approximately 15 minutes., Witnesses indicated that the objects exhibited unusual maneuvers and speeds., No optical or electronic devices were used to observe the objects., The reliability of the observers was rated as below average.
witness description: The witnesses reported the sighting but had below average reliability and experience.
